TextBlock.Text: AZOLLA: Nesia, you said you had something to discuss with me?
NESIA: Yes, it is a matter of gra... of utmost importance, and I thought it best to bring it up to you before the others.
AZOLLA: Is this regarding your discussion with Karenia? I must confess that your change in demeanor after that conversation has piqued my curiosity... Nesia, are you crying?

NESIA: I-I'm sorry Azolla, my grief is overwhelming me. I knew that our new friends possess strange abilities, so I decided to speak with one regarding the rest of our clan, to try and determine their fate, and...

NESIA: The <color=orange>Third Escape Pod</color> did not escape the <color=purple>Bramble</color>. Apparently, the pod became ensnared in the vines and, stranded away from the <color=orange>Vessel</color>, our friends, they...
AZOLLA: What are you saying, Nesia?
NESIA: They perished! They had no source of oxygen and all asphyxiated! Din is dead! Escall is dead! Even... even...
AZOLLA: ...And you're certain of this? Karenia couldn't have made some sort of mistake?
NESIA: I... no, she was quite certain. She believed that the other two pods escaped to relative safety, but she was certain that the Bramble had claimed the third pod.

AZOLLA: I will leave a note at the <color=orange>Language Lab</color> to notify Sennetti and Okalis that we need to meet. I do not wish to ruin their good mood so shortly after Sennetti's translation, but they deserve to know.
AZOLLA: ...Nesia, I know that you and Secca were partners. While we are all deeply affected by the loss of our friends, I know that you must be especially hurt by this news.
AZOLLA: Be gentle with yourself, okay?
NESIA: ...Thank you, Azolla, I will ensure I take the proper time to mourn.
